wiki.content:
"Just like Heaven", performed as a cover by Katie Melua, and originally written and performed by the British group The Cure. 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "Just like Heaven", performed as a cover by Katie Melua, and originally written and performed by the British group The Cure.

track.name: Just Like Heaven
comments: OH...MY...GOD..   shes only done my favouite cure song , her voice melts me.
Probably the best cover ever that I've heard. [7]
Katie Melua – Just Like Heaven my all time favorite tune :)
I love this version of this song. Love the movie too.
What do you mean, it's a cover?  It looks like this track was made for her.  ♥
Katie Melua has such a beautiful voice
Probably the best cover ever that I've heard. [6]
Probably the best cover ever that I've heard. [5]
Probably the best cover ever that I've heard. [4]
Probably the best cover ever that I've heard. [3]
I totally love the original bc the cure is just too good but this cover is one of the best, I agree
Probably the best cover ever that I've heard.  (2)
Probably the best cover ever that I've heard.
I think this girls voice was made for the Gods to listen to. Her album call off the search is one of the best ever made.
